item.title: Wendy add a quote by Rick Riordan
item.description: "Tell the sun and stars hello for me." -- Rick Riordan

item.title: Wendy add a quote by Rick Riordan
item.description: "<i>To my wonderful readers: Sorry about that last cliff-hanger. Well, no, not really. HAHAHAHA. But seriously, I love you guys.</i>" -- Rick Riordan

item.title: Wendy add a quote by Rick Riordan
item.description: "[Jason] faltered when he looked at Leo, who was mimicking taking notes with an air pencil. “Go on, Professor Grace!” he said, wide-eyed. “I wanna get an A on the test." -- Rick Riordan

item.title: Wendy add a quote by Rick Riordan
item.description: "I figure the world is basically a machine. I don't know who made it, if it was the Fates, or the gods, or the capital-G god or whatever. But it chugs along the way it's supposed to most of the time. Sure, little pieces break off and stuff goes haywire once in a while, but mostly... things happen for a reason." -- Rick Riordan
